story_20_06000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Errgh! So our reports were true!
Those Pokémon of yours are strong indeed!
story_20_06000/2401_1001_0200_10:
Well, we have other ways to deal with you...
I think it’s time to move our plans forward.
story_20_06000/2401_1001_0300_10:
We managed to chase them off, but I feel like
their Pokémon have gotten a lot stronger since
last time.
story_20_06000/2401_1001_0400_10:
I’ve got a bad feeling about all of this...
We should try and catch up to Calem as fast
as we can.
story_20_06000/2401_1001_0500_10:
Agreed. Why do you think he keeps running off
on his own like that?!
story_20_06000/2401_1001_0600_10:
Cynthia recommended us, so obviously she thinks
we’re skilled enough for the task. I wish he’d
lean on us a little more...
story_20_06000/2401_1001_0700_10: Maybe he’s just trying to be nice.
story_20_06000/2401_1001_0900_10:
Well, he seemed really worried that getting
us involved would affect our performance at
the tournament.
story_20_06000/2401_1001_1000_10:
I think that’s why he’s been trying so hard to
take care of this on his own.
story_20_06000/2401_1001_1100_10:
Hmm... When you put it like that, it does
make sense.
story_20_06000/2401_1001_1200_10:
How’d you figure him out so quickly?
Today was your first time meeting him, too, right?
story_20_06000/2401_1001_1300_10:
Let’s just say Calem reminds me of some friends
of mine...
story_20_06000/2401_1001_1500_10:
Bwahaha! Give up now, if y’know what’s
good for ya, kid!
story_20_06000/2401_1001_1600_10: Hey! I think I hear more of those thugs over there!
story_20_06000/2401_1001_1700_10:
Oh no! Calem could be in trouble!
Let’s go!
